position_groups: [{'company': {'id': 802174, 'name': 'Swedish Red Cross', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEoYxAQUvbd4A/company-logo_400_400/0/1547210423684?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=h1ZaD6ewGV1pr7-F6FbROTka_zDUAplNo12iM8xfsrw', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/swedish-red-cross/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Swedish Red Cross', 'description': None, 'title': 'Disaster Management Desk Officer', 'employment_type': 'Contract Full-time'}, {'location': 'Sweden', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'company': 'Swedish Red Cross', 'description': None, 'title': 'Intern - Disaster Management Desk Officer ', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': "Lucie Canuel's Intermediate Resources ", 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Lachine, Canada', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': "Lucie Canuel's Intermediate Resources ", 'description': 'RI is a residence dedicated to the rehabilitation of youths (16 – 18 years old) who come from broken families and have experienced neglect, emotional, physical, and/or sexual abuse. I was hired as an educator and after 8 months, I was promoted to be a Primary Worker. As an educator, I deescalated and intervened when youth(s) had a crisis (e.g. suicidal ideation), taught and assisted youths in acquiring independent living skills as well as improving skills such as time management and accountability. I also prepared incident and weekly reports to keep the team updated regarding events happening at the residence, booked and accompanied youths to their appointments, and tutored youths in mathematics. I was also in charge of the grocery budget and ensuring that the house is stuck in food and all necessary supplies. As a Primary Worker, in addition to above responsibilities, I work one-on-one with a youth to create an individual plan for their duration of stay at the residence. Moreover, I collaborate with their social worker to assist the youth in improving their behavioral and/or emotional problems. I conduct weekly follow-up meeting with the youth to make sure they are following their individual plan and to address any new issues. Moreover, I help the youth to find a job and budget to have a financial stability by the time they move out of the residence.', 'title': 'Interventionist', 'employment_type': 'Permanent Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 4855, 'name': 'McGill University', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQFvv1npMZWzKA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519855882412?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=nr8v7zmB2WrylsUOzl4-SxPXTtkrljlvzeSZ_ekYueA', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/mcgill-university/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Montreal, Canada Area', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'McGill University', 'description': 'For three years, I worked with Dr. Wazana and his research team to conduct the very first empirical study on the effectiveness of a Child Psychiatry Day Hospital at JGH. For 50 years, this Day Hospital offered treatment to elementary-age children with severe behavioral and emotional problems, but no empirical evidence existed to support its effectiveness. As a clinical assistant and then the Master’s student working on this project, I trained clinical personnel for data collection, coordinated data collection from multiple informants for two years, reviewed 500 charts to extract relevant data, and constructed the very first dataset for the Day Hospital. Moreover, I assisted with the integration of Day Hospital into electronic medical record using REDCap, and I was in charge of Ethics Review Board Submission for this project. My Master’s thesis was based on this project and it was published as the first empirical study on this program and one of the few studies on Child Psychiatric Day Hospital in literature. I have also presented this project in multiple local and international conferences.', 'title': 'Clinical Assistant', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 4855, 'name': 'McGill University', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQFvv1npMZWzKA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519855882412?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=nr8v7zmB2WrylsUOzl4-SxPXTtkrljlvzeSZ_ekYueA', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/mcgill-university/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'McGill University', 'description': 'I joined Dr. Ditto’s lab as an honors student to study different techniques that can reduce severe reactions in blood donors in the hope of increasing the likelihood of their return to blood donation clinics. As a student and then a part-time research assistant, I recruited participants and collected data at local blood donation clinics. I also assisted with managing the volunteers’ schedule. While writing my thesis, I conducted literature review and data analysis using SPSS. I presented my project at McGill University’s annual conference. The data collected in this project was later used for a PhD thesis and publication.', 'title': 'Research Assistant', 'employment_type': None}]}]

During the pandemic, I contacted 10 families daily and educated them on the new hygiene routine, food banks and other resources for support.'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'role': 'Online Volunteer', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Imam Ali’s Popular Students Relief Society (IAPSRS)', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'cause': None, 'description': 'IAPSRS is an NGO based in Iran with the objective of empowering and enhancing the life of children and women affected by a variety of adversities such as child labor, poverty, and natural disasters. Furthermore, I also assisted doctors in assessing the level of fluency in Farsi-speaking patients with Autism Spectrum Disorder.'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'role': 'VP Event ', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Orphan Sponsorship Program (OSP)', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'cause': 'CHILDREN', 'description': 'OSP is a university club that partners with NGOs to raise awareness and sponsor orphans across the globe. In one academic year, we collected approximately $10,000 to continue sponsoring 10 orphans for one more year.'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'role': 'Media Correspondent', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Iran Volleyball Sport News Outlet ', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'cause': None, 'description': 'Iran Volleyball was a student-run news agency recognized by the International Volleyball Federation (FIVB). We were active on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter. I was one of the two people who managed the twitter account and later was also in charge of the Instagram account. I creating educational content, reported Iran national volleyball team’s live matches on twitter, and translated interviews and articles from English to Farsi and vice-versa. Iran Volleyball was one of the first and most popular accounts reporting news on Iran national volleyball team on social media. I contributed to Twitter account gaining 4K followers (out of 11K) and my posts were re-twitted by FIVB account during 2015 and 2016 Men World League and 2016 Olympics.'}]
